ca.mcgill.ecse211.dreamteamrobot.brick1.main

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.dreamteamrobot.brick1.main.Driver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Driver
extends java.lang.Thread
    This is the main offensive thread for the navigational brick. It runs as state machine.
